data.text: Jisas takaw anɨb ak agɨl, ñɨn anep kagol ak mɨdɨl, Pita ayɨp, Jemis ayɨp, Jemis nɨmam ne Jon ak ayɨp, kɨlop poŋɨd, dum awl alaŋ olap amɨl kɨli ke nep yelak.
Yelaknɨŋ, Jisas wak nop ak ke yɨbɨl lɨl, jomulɨk ak sub tek nɨŋɨd, chech ne ak ñɨñakol yɨbɨl gɨlɨg yek.
Anɨgaknɨŋ nɨgɨlak, Mosis ayɨp Yilayja ayɨp, bɨ omɨŋal apɨl Jisas ayɨp takaw ag yelek.
Pita anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, ne Jisas nop agak, Bɨawl, chɨn awl mɨdobun ak, tep yɨbɨl mɨdobun agak. Nad yaw age yɨl, kal bad ak omɨŋal nokom gɨnɨgun agak. Nep olap, Mosis nop olap, Yilayja nop olap agak.

Anɨb agaknɨŋ, wɨsɨp kayɨg yɨbɨl ak apɨl, kɨlop mɨdupsek yu gak. Yuwɨg daknɨŋ, takaw olap wɨsɨp nab anɨb ak nɨb agak, Ñɨ mapen yad yɨbɨl nɨm awl agak. Nop nɨgen yɨp tep yɨbɨl gup agak. Takaw tɨtay agɨnɨmuŋ ak, nɨg dɨnɨmɨb agak.
Takaw anɨb ak anɨgɨl agek nɨŋɨd, Jisas bɨne okok gos kuŋay nɨŋɨd pɨlɨkɨl, apyap kɨgom yɨmɨl, jomulɨk kɨli ak lum ayaŋ yɨl lɨl yelak.
Pen Jisas apɨl kɨlop dɨnɨŋɨd agak, Ma pɨlɨkɨnɨmɨb, tɨkjakɨm agak.
Agek, kɨlan gɨl nɨgɨlak, ne nokom yek.
Pen dum ak kuyan gɨlɨg, Jisas kɨlop agak, Mɨñɨl tɨtay gosup nepɨm anɨb ak, binɨb okok kɨlop ma agñɨnɨmɨb agak. Kɨdek Bɨ Olap Ñɨne kumɨl tɨkjakek nɨm, binɨb okok kɨlop agñɨnɨmɨb agak.
Agek nop agɨlak, Bɨ kɨli Mosis takaw ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nɨgtep gep okok, kɨli taynen apal, Yilayja ned apenɨgab, kɨdek Bɨ God nop aglup ak lum awl ownɨgab apal agɨlak?
Agelak agak, Nɨŋɨd apal, takaw anɨb ak mɨdeb agak. Yilayja ned apɨl kɨlop agtep gɨnɨgab agak.
17.12 Mat 11.14 Pen nɨbop agebin, Yilayja owak ak pen, apek nop ma nɨgɨlak agak. Gos kɨli ke nɨgɨlak tek nop gɨ tɨmel gɨlak agak. Pen Bɨ Olap Ñɨne ak nop abe anɨb ak tek gɨnɨgabal agak.
17.13 Luk 1.17 Anɨb agek, bɨne okok nɨgɨlak, Jisas Yilayja nop agak anɨb ak, Jon Bɨ Ñɨg Pakñeb ak nop nokom agak.
Pen Jisas ayɨp bɨne omɨŋal nokom ayɨp, kɨli gu ayaŋ amjakɨl nɨgɨlak, binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl yelak. Bɨ olap binɨb yelak nab anɨb ak apɨl, Jisas yek sɨŋak kɨgom yɨmɨl agak,
Bɨawl, ñɨ yad ak mapen nɨgɨnɨmɨn agak. Nop sawl lek mɨdtep ma gup agak. Pel am mab yɨneb nab okok sek, ñɨg nab okok sek gɨ dam pakup agak.
Nop dad bɨnak okok yesɨpal ak amen, nop gɨ mel nɨŋɨd kelɨgɨpal agak.

Agek Jisas agak, Nɨbi binɨb mɨñɨl lum awl mɨdebɨm okok, God nop gos ma nɨŋɨd nab nɨbi ayaŋ gɨ tɨmel gɨpɨm agak. Anɨgɨpɨm teplep mel agak. Ma yɨbɨl gos nepɨm anɨb ak, yad ñɨn tɨtay nɨb ayɨp mɨdɨl, mɨŋel nɨbop ak dad ajenɨm agak? Ñɨ anɨb ak dad sɨŋawl yɨp yɨl owɨm agak.
Anɨb agek dad apelak, kɨcheki nop abaŋ lak ak agyokek, won anɨb ak nep suŋ lak.
Anɨgek, bɨne okok Jisas yek ak apɨl, kɨli nep mɨdɨlɨg nop agnɨŋɨd agɨlak, Tay gek kɨcheki abaŋ lak anɨb ak, agyok mel nɨŋɨd kelɨgɨpun agɨlak?

Agelak agak, God gek seŋ amnɨgab agɨl, gos kɨles gɨl ma nepɨm ak nɨm anɨgup agak. Pen yad nɨbop nɨŋɨd agebin agak. Gos nɨbi ak mab mastet mɨdup sɨkol mɨdeb tek nɨgenɨgabɨm, dum awl lɨg sɨŋadaŋ amnoŋ agem, God gek amnɨgab agak. Pen nɨg wos gɨnɨgabɨm ak, tap tay okok mɨdupsek agem, agɨnɨgabɨm tek gɨnɨgab agak.17.20-21 Bɨ gos nɨgep ogɨnap, gos kɨli anɨgɨl mɨdeb, takaw ogɨnap sek mɨdeb. Takaw anɨb ak anɨb agup, Pen kɨcheki abaŋ lup anɨb ak, yokɨp agyokep tek ma lup agup. Tap mɨdup kelɨgɨl God nop agnɨg mɨdɨl nɨm, agyokɨpal agup.
Jisas bɨne okok ayɨp, Galili plopens apnan gelak, kɨlop agak, Wulep mɨdeb, Bɨ Olap Ñɨne nop mɨmug nɨŋɨd, binɨb ogɨnap kɨlop ñɨnɨgabal agak.
Ñel, nop pɨsnep paklel kumnɨgab ak pen, ñɨn omɨŋal nokom mɨdɨl, tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨnɨgab agak. Anɨb agek, bɨne okok nop chɨb nɨŋɨd, gos kuŋay yɨbɨl nɨgɨlak.
Pen kɨdek Jisas bɨne okok ayɨp taun Kapeneyam amelak, bɨ God agnɨgep kal awl takis dep okok apɨl, Pita nop agɨlak, Tisa nɨbi ak, takis gup sek akaŋ agɨlak?
Agelak agak, Yaw, ne takis gup sek agak.
Anɨb agek Pita agak, Binɨb pal okok nɨb dɨpal agak. Agek Jisas agak, Yaw, binɨb kɨli ke okok takis ma gɨpal agak.

Chɨn pen takis ma ñonɨgabun, kɨlop mɨlɨk yownɨgab tek lup agak. Anɨb ak nad ñu dam ñɨg ayaŋ yokɨl, kubsal ned dɨnɨgaban ak, meg mɨgan ak tɨg lakɨl nɨgɨnɨgaban, mani mɨdup won olap yenɨgab agak. Dɨl, dam takis chɨlmɨŋal ak ñɨnɨmɨn agak.
